trans-unit.source: Specifies how to print content that contains color or shades of gray.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何列印包含彩色或灰階的內容。

trans-unit.source: Use the values of this type for these purposes:
trans-unit.target: 針對這些用途使用此類型的值：

trans-unit.source: As members of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.OutputColorCapability%2A> collection, which is a property of <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>, these values specify the types of output that a printer supports.
trans-unit.target: 為成員<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.OutputColorCapability%2A>集合，其屬性的<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>，這些值會指定的印表機支援的輸出類型。

trans-unit.source: (Many printers support more than one type.)
As the value of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.OutputColor%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>, they direct the printer to produce the designated type of output.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.OutputColor%2A>屬性<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>，它們會直接以產生的輸出指定之的類型的印表機。

trans-unit.source: The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> objects.
trans-unit.target: **未知**屬性中不會使用值<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>物件。

trans-unit.source: You should never set a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> property to `Unknown`.

If some other <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the output color feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> object in your application that is constructed with that document will have `Unknown` as the value of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.OutputColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>產生應用程式已建立*PrintTicket 文件*無法辨識的選項來設定輸出色彩功能 (也就是未定義中的選項[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，則<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>該文件，建構應用程式中的物件都有`Unknown`做為值<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.OutputColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> classes.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>和<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>類別無法被繼承，您可以擴充[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)辨識不計算中的列印裝置功能<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>或<xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 列印結構描述和建立新的列印系統類別擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this enumeration to set <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用這個列舉來設定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>值。

trans-unit.source: Output that prints in a grayscale.
Output that prints in a single color and with the same degree of intensity.
trans-unit.target: 以單色和同等濃度列印的輸出。

trans-unit.source: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: 功能 (其選項由這個列舉表示) 設定的選項並未在[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定義。
